details.title: Better Travel
items: Fixed Relic Hunter display on map when in School of Sorcery

details.title: Better UI
items: Added ability to toggle trap math display for each stat
Updated Daily Draw purchase to keep you on the same page

details.title: Experiments - Emotes

items: Added a check for '?no-image-upscaling' query parameter to temporarily disable

details.title: Inventory Lock And Hide
items: Fixed Lock/Unlock All buttons not updating item buttons

details.title: Location HUD - Fort Rox
items: Fixed Heart of the Meteor power not correctly displaying
Added more visible Heart of the Meteor power display
